name: Broken Island
description:
Broken Island is a fascinating game developed by 4 young and ambitious computer science student. The game is for educational purposes and broaches the issue of climate change and environmental problems.

The player gets the opportunity to learn about different environmental problems by playing mini games. Each minigame has its own emphasis with individual controls. The mini games can be found on an polluted island which gradually gets better by winning the mini games.
Saving the world step by step in a fun way.

---------------- Controls ----------------

[w,a,s,d] Movement [space] Jump [e] Interact [scroll] Zoom in/out [m] Menu/Map
